subject: How to write a test case for a GUI application

Look at William Wake's web site. There's a really good example of writing
unit tests for a UI in Java. I can't think of the address just now, but do a
web search on "William Wake" and you'll find him.

JBR.

> Subject: How to write a test case for a GUI application
>
> Hi all,
>
> Is there some example for writing test cases for GUI applications. That
> is, I'm trying to simulate the user's actions - clicking on various
> buttons to operate the application.
>
> Thanks,
> Ron
